alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 02 at 4:01AM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Vermont. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible Friday evening through Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to begin across the region Friday evening and become moderate to locally heavy Friday night into Saturday morning before tapering off Saturday afternoon or evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
